Extract parameters' draws

Source: R/draws.R
extract_draws.Rd

Extract parameters' draws

extract_draws(obj, draws)

Arguments

obj

Array/Vector/Matrix of draws (cf. first dimension) or list of it.

draws

Vector of draws to extract.

Value

Dataframe with columns: Draw, Index, Value and Parameter.

Examples

x <- rnorm(1e3)
X <- matrix(x, ncol = 10)
a <- array(rnorm(80), dim = c(10, 2, 2, 2))
extract_draws(x, sample(1:length(x), 10))
#>    Draw Index      Value Parameter
#> 1   337    NA -2.5224215          
#> 2    64    NA -0.1015448          
#> 3   355    NA -0.3098666          
#> 4   967    NA -1.8900784          
#> 5   585    NA  0.5390395          
#> 6   696    NA -0.8066055          
#> 7   194    NA -0.5038305          
#> 8   700    NA  1.1046608          
#> 9     5    NA -0.1250447          
#> 10  731    NA  0.6247641          
extract_draws(X, sample(1:nrow(X), 10)) %>% head()
#>   Draw Index       Value Parameter
#> 1    5     1 -0.12504471          
#> 2   63     1  0.51154396          
#> 3   78     1  0.04641622          
#> 4   52     1  0.99386670          
#> 5   48     1  0.48900021          
#> 6   57     1 -1.00808531          
extract_draws(a, sample(1:10, 5)) %>% head()
#>    Draw      Value Index Parameter
#> 3     3  0.6849911    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 4     4  0.2509666    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 5     5 -1.1850375    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 6     6  0.2721705    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 10   10 -0.3227618    NA   [1,1,1]
#> 13    3  0.1711893    NA   [2,1,1]
extract_draws(list(x = x, X = X, a = a), 1:10) %>% head()
#>   Draw Index       Value Parameter
#> 1    1    NA  0.98208360         x
#> 2    2    NA -0.38751716         x
#> 3    3    NA -0.07919454         x
#> 4    4    NA -0.51528934         x
#> 5    5    NA -0.12504471         x
#> 6    6    NA -0.83897255         x
